modName: Verdant ugly bright river grass replace
summary: This mod simple repleace verdant ugly river grass with pretty flowers. No esp, clean and easy.
descriptionHtml:
One grass is called solojunco in Vardant is too bright in some ENB, this kind of grass usually show up near lakes and rivers. They block all your ground and rock textures and too luminous than other object.

This mod requires Verdant version 2.2: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60220]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60220[/url]

Installation:
for NMM user--- use NMM or put them in the data folder of X\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim

for MO user--- find Verdent folder in OM mod folder, replace the files


the texture is made by 32cm , from the mod Tamriel Reloaded Grasses - Plants - Shrubs: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59774] https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59774[/url]

recommended mods:
Voluptuous Grasses-The T H I C C K E N I N G
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90945]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90945[/url]
Tamriel Reloaded HD
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61995]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61995[/url]
author: yhniiii
